relation: Great for these types of students
FIRST TIME COLLEGE STUDENTS STUDENTS THAT STILL WANT TO LIVE AT HOME TO SAVE MONEY.
DID NOT EAT AT THE FACILITY.
ACADEMICALLY CHALLENGING BUT VERY INFORMATIVE... I LEARNED ALOT IN THE LAST TWO SEMESTERS.

BE OPEN MINDED AND REMEMBER YOU ARE AN ADULT. COLLEGE IS DIFFERENT THAN HIGH SCHOOL, YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR WORK AND FOR PAYING FOR YOUR CLASSES. IF YOU DO NOT SHOW UP FOR CLASS YOU ARE THE ONE THAT LOSES, NOT ONLY MONEY BUT NOTES OR QUIZZES...
TEACHERS ARE VERY HELPFUL. CLOSE TO HOME. CLASSES ARE FUN.

textAfterTable: The best bang for my buck. Did enjoy being here I enjoyed my time at Southern Union. It was conveniently located to my home so it only took minutes to get to class. The instructors were excellent. The atmosphere of the school was pleasant and a little more relaxed than a major university. Did learn a lot I learned a lot and would recommend this college to anyone who learns better in smaller classes or who has been out of school for a while and wishes to return. Login to rate or flag the reviews Sarah from Roanoke, AL 06/24/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 26 Categories Comments Campus Safety This is a very safe neighborhood as well as a very safe campus. I wont say crime free,
